normalised: Hey students! Feeling the pressure of those tuition fees? Chill! Scholarship portals are becoming your new best friend in the E D Tech world. Think of them as online treasure hunts for funding your dreams. Sites like Vidyadhan and Buddy four Study are making it easier than ever to find scholarships based on your caste, academic performance, even extracurricular activities. Forget sifting through endless newspaper ads like your parents did! From Class tenth students in Chennai to P H D scholars researching A I in I I T Delhi, there's something for everyone. Even if you scored just above average, there are plenty of niche scholarships up for grabs. Many portals now offer personalized recommendations based on your profile. So, after gorging on some delicious biryani this weekend, dedicate some time to explore these platforms. Maybe this Onam, you'll receive the biggest gift of all: a funded education! No need to borrow rupees five lakh from your uncle anymore!
